title: Social justice investors
description:
The kids of America’s wealthiest want to invest their way to change. But is “anti-capitalist” investing even possible? Whizy Kim (@Whizyk) explains.

Today’s episode was produced and engineered by Jon Ehrens and hosted by Adam Clark Estes.

Support Recode Daily by making a financial contribution to Vox! bit.ly/givepodcasts
